From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2023 Indian filmHukus BukusTheatrical Release PosterDirected byVinay Bhardwaj   & Saumitra SinghWritten byRanjit Singh MashianaScreenplay byVipul Patel & Jagtar Singh KalwanaProduced by
Vinay Bhardwaj

Darsheel Safary

Sajjad Delafrooz

CinematographyHemant Gulshan ChauhanEdited byDevendra MurdeshwarMusic bySongs:Puneet DixitBackground Score:Tuhin K. BiswasProductioncompanyShining Sun StudiosDistributed byPVR INOX PicturesRelease date
3 November 2023 (2023-11-03)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Hukus Bukus is a 2023 Indian hindi-language sport drama film directed by Vinay Bhardwaj .[1][2] The film stars Darsheel Safary, Arun Govil , Sajjad Delafrooz , Gautam Vij and Mir Sarwar.[3][4] Darsheel has played the role of fan of cricketer Sachin Tendulkar.[5][6] Hukus Bukus was released in theatres on 3 November 2023.[7]


Cast[edit]
Darsheel Safary as Arjun
Arun Govil as Pandit Radheshayam
Sajjad Delafrooz as MLA Iqbal Qureshi
Gautam Vij as Vikram Rathi
Mir Sarwar as Coach Khalid
Vansh Sayani as Rohan
Naisha Khanna
Abhishek Garg
Soundtrack[edit]
Lyrics of the song was written by Sanjay Masoomm.
